body:
The nrm package specifically requests py-jsonschema@2.6.0. Attempting to install this package results in the following error:

==> Warning: There is no checksum on file to fetch py-jsonschema@2.6.0 safely.
==> Error: Will not fetch py-jsonschema@2.6.0
Add a checksum or use --no-checksum to skip this check.
title: Installation issue: py-jsonchema (No checksum provided for @2.6.0 requested by nrm)
